title: When the enemy jungler is camping your lane

replies.body: People really don't get how behind you get as a jungler if you sit there waiting for a gank that doesn't pay off.

My favorite thing is when i'm waiting to gank and the enemy in all chat is like "oh hi how's it goin jg"
I'm sitting here like oh...thank you...i would've probably stayed while longer...i guess i'll come back with a sweeper/pink ward.
I love screwing with the enemy jungler by saying that whether I see them or not.

*randomly says hi zac*
{{champion:154}} *doing red*
{{champion:154}} shit theres a ward
{{champion:154}} {{item:3341}} 
{{champion:154}} ???

Favorite time I did it: I had just placed a ward into the bush by Raptor. On my way back to lane, couldn't see jungler but I said hi Vi anyways. Saw the flash particles as she came into vision, and their GP had ulted to save her. No one was even remotely close...lol.

You should be awarded the troll award.
Can we get {{champion:48}} over here?

I will happily accept the award.
http://s2.quickmeme.com/img/f0/f0cda7c9cf67393a46dd6e7bc2adbf5ad76f2888aa628d0df576f2a82210b6fe.jpg

omg that's hilarious. 

*causually farming my krugs*

"Hi {{champion:64}} !"

"omg wtf they have wards in my jg? when did they get them here? where? better not gank this lane they know im here now!"
Good times when you could place more than 4 wards

Saw the second image: "aww! Kawai!"... Couple seconds later I was horrified!

If u look closely on the still image u will see a demon lurking...
To bad so many people forget that at time. Even I do at times... Yes I admitted that.
